text: Stanley Robert Fansler (born February 12, 1965) is an American former professional baseball pitcher. Fansler started five games for the Pittsburgh Pirates of the Major League Baseball(MLB) in 1986, losing three and winning none. ==Sources== , or Retrosheet, or SABR Biography Project, or Pura Pelota (Venezuelan Winter League) Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:American expatriate baseball players in Canada Category:Baseball players from West Virginia Category:Buffalo Bisons (minor league) players Category:Carolina Mudcats players Category:Gulf Coast Rangers players Category:Harrisburg Senators players Category:Hawaii Islanders players Category:Major League Baseball pitchers Category:Nashua Pirates players Category:Navegantes del Magallanes players Category:People from Elkins, West Virginia Category:Pittsburgh Pirates players Category:Salem Buccaneers players Category:Tiburones de La Guaira players Category:Vancouver Canadians players Category:Watertown Pirates players
title: Stan Fansler
